text: Tej Parkash Singh is an Indian Politician from the state of Punjab. ==Constituency== Singh represented the Payal, Ludhiana constituency from 2002-2007 and 2007-2012. ==Posts== Singh was the transport Minister in the Government of Punjab. ==Political Party== Singh is from the Indian National Congress. ==Family== Singh's father Beant Singh was the Chief Minister of Punjab from 1992–1995. == References == Category:Living people Category:Indian National Congress politicians Category:People from Punjab, India Category:Indian National Congress politicians from Punjab, India Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Tej Parkash Singh
